room_title: Escape room "CSI: Conway" by Escape Mystery Rooms in Little Rock
room_description:
A young girl has gone missing from a park near the police station.  When the kidnapper had to leave her alone for an hour she knew it was her only chance to escape.  When the police questioned her once she got to safety they were shocked to discover that an employee of the department might be involved.  Internal affairs were immediately called in to take over the investigation.
  They assembled an independent group of investigators to uncover the truth.  They know they only have one hour to find the final piece of evidence to arrest the suspect before he realizes she has escaped.  Can your team accomplish the goal or will you let the suspect slip away to strike again?
